title: AHR Valley Wine Region: #Flutwein - Our Worst Vintage
challenge: Raise awareness and funds for the Ahr Valley flooding victims.
strategy: Used damaged wine bottles rescued from flood to create crowdfunding and awareness.
implementation: TV and OOH media partnerships promoting branded rescued wine bottles.
results.other_kpis: High visibility and national conversation generated

title: Partners Life: Last Performance
strategy: Used murder mystery show to highlight consequences of unexpected death.
implementation: TV and digital campaign leveraging popular TV show characters.

title: KPN: A Piece of Me
strategy: Launched TikTok talk show and music collaboration to engage and educate youth.
implementation: Digital campaign using popular musician and interactive content.

title: Cadbury: Shah Rukh Khan-My-Ad
challenge: Support small retailers and increase brand consideration.
strategy: Personalized ads featuring celebrity Shah Rukh Khan.
implementation: Digital and social media campaign allowing user-generated ads.
